ygData.subject: The new continent
ygData.msgSnippet: Greets, If you ve currently been to the EQVault , then you know that they re adding a new land mass in _approximately_ nine months.
ygData.messageBody:
Greets,

If you've currently been to the EQVault < http://www.eqvault.com >,
then you know that they're adding a new land mass in _approximately_ nine
months.

The Necromancer is sourly lacking a town of operation. There is
supposed to be a City of Necromancers -- it is a _integeral_ part of the
story of Norrat (before the time of us players) -- and, considering that the
race on this island is also going to be an evil race including Necromancer,
and they are still in the process of adding this continent, what better
place and time to add the City of Necromancers ?

It is simple to write feedback about this. During gameplay, simply
type the command /feedback . Make sure you're not in an area where you're
going to be attacked, and please request that our city be added, and be sure
to mention what a prestine opportunity this is to add it! They're added
better graphics -- more colorful, better sprites, animated trees in wind
(which was an example) -- the Necromancer city will offer a WONDERFUL
opportunity to create and use new sprites!

Thanks folks!
~Mysk
